p:
The virus was subsequently classified as SARS-CoV-2 by the International Committee on taxonomic of viruses (ICTV) and the WHO named the official coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) 7, 8 SARS-CoV-2 has now being reported in all continents and 192 countries, reaching an incredible 4 million infected individuals, close to 70.000 deaths and 260.000 recoveries.
9
